name: Buenard
description: Buenard is a high-quality serif typeface for art books. It is based on the Transitional Roman classical structure, with less contrasted strokes and heavier serifs. It has its own contemporary style, combining elegance, consistency and legibility for all text sizes, making it an excellent choice when selecting a serif font. Buenard was initially designed for an Argentinian art publisher and progressed as a final project in the Postgraduate Career in Typography at the University of Buenos Aires. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/buenard .
author: Gustavo Ibarra
